title: Scabies
brief_description: Exposition of modern British methods used in diagnosis and treatment of scabies. The film shows the habits and life-cycle of the mite, the secondary infections which make diagnosis and treatment difficult, and methods of treatment. Treatment at a centre is shown, and instruction for home treatment are illustrated. Examination of contact is also dealt with. Intended for doctors, health visitors, sanitary inspectors, nurses and medical orderlies.
